base_reference_template.description: Base procedural polygon parameters - REFERENCE ONLY
base_reference_template.author: Mr. Chuck
base_reference_template.comments: Template showing all available parameters. Copy sections below and modify specific params. DO NOT RUN THIS DIRECTLY - it's for reference.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape VERTICES=6,10 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=15 OPERATIONS=sawtooth,split_offset DIRECTION_BIAS=random DEPTH_RANGE=0.3,0.8 WEIGHT_DECAY=0.5 REMOVE_PROB=0.0 DISTORT_PROB=0.0 SAVE_ITERATIONS=false

test_basic_5vertex.author: Mr. Chuck
test_basic_5vertex.comments: Quick test with minimal parameters. Good starting point.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon test VERTICES=5 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=10

explore_sawtooth_inward.description: Sawtooth operation with inward bias - creates compact spiky forms
explore_sawtooth_inward.author: Mr. Chuck
explore_sawtooth_inward.comments: Testing sawtooth with inward bias. Creates interesting compact, star-like shapes.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape1 VERTICES=8 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=20 OPERATIONS=sawtooth DIRECTION_BIAS=inward DEPTH_RANGE=0.4,0.7

explore_split_offset_outward.description: Split offset with outward bias - creates radiating organic forms
explore_split_offset_outward.author: Mr. Chuck
explore_split_offset_outward.comments: Testing split_offset with outward bias. More organic, flowing shapes.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape1 VERTICES=6 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=18 OPERATIONS=split_offset DIRECTION_BIAS=outward DEPTH_RANGE=0.3,0.6

mixed_operations_random.description: Mixed operations with random bias - unpredictable organic forms
mixed_operations_random.author: Mr. Chuck
mixed_operations_random.comments: Combining sawtooth and split_offset with random bias. Most organic looking.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape1 VERTICES=7 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=25 OPERATIONS=sawtooth,split_offset DIRECTION_BIAS=random DEPTH_RANGE=0.2,0.8

with_removal_probability.description: Using remove_point operation for evolved, simplified forms
with_removal_probability.author: Mr. Chuck
with_removal_probability.comments: Adding REMOVE_PROB creates more variation - shapes can simplify during evolution.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape1 VERTICES=10 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=30 OPERATIONS=split_offset REMOVE_PROB=0.15 DEPTH_RANGE=0.3,0.7

with_distortion.description: Using distort_original to move initial vertices during evolution
with_distortion.author: Mr. Chuck
with_distortion.comments: DISTORT_PROB makes initial vertices move, creating flowing transformations.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape1 VERTICES=6 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=25 OPERATIONS=sawtooth DISTORT_PROB=0.2 DEPTH_RANGE=0.3,0.7 DIRECTION_BIAS=inward

animation_preview_test.description: Creates snapshots for animation preview testing
animation_preview_test.author: Mr. Chuck
animation_preview_test.comments: Uses SAVE_ITERATIONS to create snapshots. Run then use ANIMATE command to preview evolution.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon anim_test VERTICES=6 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=20 OPERATIONS=sawtooth,split_offset SAVE_ITERATIONS=true SNAPSHOT_INTERVAL=2

batch_dataset_generation.description: Template for BATCH command - generates varied dataset
batch_dataset_generation.author: Mr. Chuck
batch_dataset_generation.comments: Uses RAND() for variation. Perfect for: BATCH 100 procedural_library.json batch_dataset_generation dataset
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape VERTICES=RAND(6,10) BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=RAND(15,25) OPERATIONS=sawtooth,split_offset DIRECTION_BIAS=random DEPTH_RANGE=RAND(0.2,0.5),RAND(0.5,0.9) REMOVE_PROB=RAND(0.0,0.2)

composition_layered.description: Multi-layer composition with background and foreground
composition_layered.author: Mr. Chuck
composition_layered.comments: Creates a complete composition with three layers at different z-orders.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon background VERTICES=12 BOUNDS=0,0,768,768 ITERATIONS=30 OPERATIONS=split_offset,sawtooth DIRECTION_BIAS=random
PROC dynamic_polygon midground VERTICES=8 BOUNDS=150,150,600,600 ITERATIONS=20 OPERATIONS=sawtooth DIRECTION_BIAS=outward
PROC dynamic_polygon foreground VERTICES=5 BOUNDS=250,250,500,500 ITERATIONS=12 OPERATIONS=split_offset DIRECTION_BIAS=inward

squarewave_exploration.description: Testing squarewave operation - creates rectangular protrusions
squarewave_exploration.author: Mr. Chuck
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape1 VERTICES=6 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=15 OPERATIONS=squarewave DEPTH_RANGE=0.3,0.6

high_complexity_test.description: High iteration count with all operations for complex forms
high_complexity_test.author: Mr. Chuck
high_complexity_test.comments: Very complex evolution. Takes longer but creates intricate shapes.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon complex VERTICES=8 BOUNDS=100,100,600,600 ITERATIONS=50 OPERATIONS=sawtooth,split_offset,squarewave DIRECTION_BIAS=random DEPTH_RANGE=0.2,0.9 REMOVE_PROB=0.1 DISTORT_PROB=0.1 WEIGHT_DECAY=0.4
